Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a bend in the road where Hofton turns to the west and northeast.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue turns to the southeast as it approaches the Oceancrest Military Headquarters, which you can see to the east. To the south, you can see the East Oceancrest City Guard Barracks, where the guards and other personnel are housed. Much of Oceancrest's economy depends on the military force keeping barbarian cultures outside of Oceancrest from breaching the city walls.
